summary: Cass is a successful business woman that appears unsuccessful in her personal life and decides to try The Daters Handbook at her sisters encouragement and dates several guys to test the process
cast: Meghan Markle|Kristoffer Polaha|Jonathan Scarfe|Lynda Boyd|Christine Chatelain|Adam Greydon Reid|Teryl Rothery|Willie Aames|Winnie Hung|Zenon Brown|Alika Autran|Graeme Duffy|Matt Hamilton|Aidan Kahn|Kayden Magnuson|Andrew Suttar|Drew Ray Tanner|Michael Teigen|Brittney Wilson|Tom MacNeill
title: En busca del hombre ideal
